org.springframework.test.web.client

接口 RequestExpectationManager

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractRequestExpectationManager, SimpleRequestExpectationManager, UnorderedRequestExpectationManager

    public interface RequestExpectationManager
    Abstraction for creating HTTP request expectations, applying them to actual requests (in strict or random order), and verifying whether expectations have been met.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.3
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ResponseActions expectRequest(ExpectedCount count, RequestMatcher requestMatcher)
      Set up a new request expectation.
      void reset()
      Reset the internal state removing all expectations and recorded requests.
      org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpResponse validateRequest(org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequest request)
      Validate the given actual request against the declared expectations.
      void verify()
      Verify that all expectations have been met.

    • 方法详细资料

      • expectRequest

        ResponseActions expectRequest(ExpectedCount count,
                              RequestMatcher requestMatcher)
        Set up a new request expectation. The returned ResponseActions is used to add more expectations and define a response.
        参数:
        requestMatcher - a request expectation
        返回:
        for setting up further expectations and define a response

      • validateRequest

        org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpResponse validateRequest(org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequest request)
                                                            throws IOException
        Validate the given actual request against the declared expectations. Is successful return the mock response to use or raise an error.
        参数:
        request - the request
        返回:
        the response to return if the request was validated.
        抛出:
        AssertionError - when some expectations were not met
        IOException

      • verify

        void verify()
        Verify that all expectations have been met.
        抛出:
        AssertionError - when some expectations were not met

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the internal state removing all expectations and recorded requests.
